section.name: Examples

p.b:
There are no examples yet! This is just an idea that has not been implemented yet. You can find some basic examples in the src/uitest that contain some of the widgets that are present in Xulux.
We need lot's of improvement in this area though. If you want a specific use case or example, please don't hestitate to mail us with your wishes or add a request in the bug database Jira.

section.p: The hard part of systems like this is to decide if this system is useable to you. To make the decision easier, I provide some examples of current scenarios that are supported.
If you can think of any usefull examples that can be added, please let us know!

subsection.name: Maven
subsection.p: NYX needs maven to be build. Since I assume you already have maven, this is an example which should run without any trouble. Maven uses a project.xml file, that is being processed by Betwixt into useable objects. From this NYX will automatically create a dictionary and a gui, which lets you edit the project.xml (currently limited, since no support for tables is present yet) and save the xml again. The saving is not done by nyx (it doesn't want to now about that) , but by a rule which materializes the bean back into the xml via Betwixt
You can start the example by typing maven examples:maven
